00017 =head1 NAME
00018 
00019 contextLimitedNumeric.pl - Allows numeric entry but no operations.
00020 
00021 =head1 DESCRIPTION
00022 
00023 Implements a context in which numbers can be entered,
00024 but no operations are permitted between them.
00025 
00026 There are two versions:  one for lists of numbers
00027 and one for a single number.  Select them using
00028 one of the following commands:
00029 
00030     Context("LimitedNumeric-List");
00031     Context("LimiteNumeric");
00032 
00033 (Now uses Parcer::Legacy::LimitedNumeric to implement
00034 these contexts.)
00035 
00036 =cut
00037 
00038 loadMacros("MathObjects.pl");
00039 
00040 sub _contextLimitedNumeric_init {
00041 
00042   my $context = $main::context{"LimitedNumeric-List"} = Parser::Context->getCopy("LimitedNumeric");
00043   $context->{name} = "LimitedNumeric-List";
00044   $context->operators->redefine(',');
00045 
00046   main::Context("LimitedNumeric");  ### FIXME:  probably should require the author to set this explicitly
00047 }
00048 
00049 1;
